alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:32PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH SIDE OF COTTONWOOD IN YAVAPAI COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM MST... At 529 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Verde Village, or 9 miles northwest of Camp Verde. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Verde Village, Cottonwood Airport, Bridgeport, Middle Verde, Jordan, Cornville, Tissaw Trailhead, Deadhorse Ranch State Park, Beaverhead Flat. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 near mile marker 290. State Route 260 between mile markers 207 and 215. State Route 89A between mile markers 352 and 358. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
